thread.section_title: Jomashop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jomashop | www.jomashop.com | 7 of 263
thread.title: Dennis

author: Dennis
title: Dennis
text: When the watch I had my eyes on for long time reduce to clearance at a deals could not be resist, and with a combine choice of many different payment exceptance including PayPal is a huge plus for me. Since PayPal credit offer no payment or interest for 4 months, it simply a great way to purchased a big ticket item. Shipping was fast, package were carefully pack and I could not be happier with my purchased. Overall I'm very satisfied not only with my watch but how Jomashop kept in touch even after the transaction has been completed. 5 stars and would recommend anyone as a first time to give Jomashop a try.
